body: 這作者寫的劇情賺不到錢吧

This shitty dougin again? What a moral freak is the author who came up with such a perversion of the plot of a wonderful romantic manga? And also the one who posted it twice in a day. 
Normally, if I saw the tag, I would pass it by, but not in this case.
I like ntr but pls not boku no kokoro no yabai yatsu just pls not that manga
